name: Journey Home (jordan)
description:
Originally created in January 2019 for the Global Game Jam.

Journey home is a story about an aspiring guitarist who has given up on his dream. As he makes his way back home he meets an interesting cast of characters that will change his life forever. 

Programming - @smol_jordan
Music - @smol_jordan, Andrew Maddox
Design - @kevinalbregard
Art - @nartrart, @thecreepyreaper
